Class PersonManager

    Person's access point for application functionality

    Oleksandr Grygorenko (a1601931)

      • getPosts

        public Post[] getPosts(Person publisher,
                       java.util.Date oldest,
                       java.util.Date newest)
        Retrieves posts of the given person
        Parameters:
        publisher - posts' publisher
        oldest - lower datetime bounder of the posts to be delivered (null if since the beginning of time)
        newest - upper datetime bounder of the posts to be delivered (null if till the present moment)
        Returns:
        posts of the given person

        birthplace - person's birthplace
        customPersonalLink - person's custom personal link
        name - person's name
        residencePlace - person's residence place

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        friendship entity between the logged in person and the person given; null if none exists

      • isPostReported

        public boolean isPostReported(Post p)
        checks if the given post has been already reported by the person
        Parameters:
        p - post
        Returns:
        true if reported; false otherwise

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend(Person friend)
        sends invitation for the friendship to another person; accepts the counter invitation if one exists. On error no changes are applied.
        Parameters:
        friend - person to send invitation (or whose invitation to accept)

      • removeFriend

        public void removeFriend(Person friend)
        Removes the person from the friend list / cancels friendship invitation. On error no changes are applied.
        Parameters:
        friend - person, friendship with whom / friendship invitation to whom is to be cancelled

      • reportPost

        public void reportPost(Report r)
        Reports a post. On error no changes are applied.

      • getConversation

        public Message[] getConversation(Person interlocutor,
                                 java.util.Date oldest,
                                 java.util.Date newest)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Retrieves person's conversation with a friend/support team.
        Parameters:
        interlocutor - person's interlocutor or null if support team
        oldest - lower datetime bounder of the messages to be delivered (null if since the beginning of time)
        newest - upper datetime bounder of the messages to be delivered (null if till the present moment)
        Returns:
        conversation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if interlocutor is a person who is not a friend

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message m)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sends message to a friend/support team
        Parameters:
        m - message to be sent
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on attempt to send a message on behalf of another person or to a person, who is not a friend

      • search

        public java.util.HashMap<Person,java.lang.String> search(java.lang.String query,
                                                         boolean isFriend)
        Searches for a person by his name.
        Parameters:
        query - person's name pattern to be compared with during the search; pattern is considered to be compatible with person's name if there is an injective function from the set of words in the pattern to the set of words in person's name, whose arguments are substrings of the corresponding values
        isFriend - flag indicating if the searched people must be friends
        Returns:
        hashmap of pairs "found person - their name with highlighted recognized pattern compatibilities"

      • getBlockingReason

        public java.lang.String getBlockingReason()
        Gets account blocking reason
        Returns:
        account blocking reason (null if not blocked)
